## Form.getListOfValues() method

Get the LOV for the given block and field

**Signature:**

```typescript
getListOfValues(block: string, field: string): ListOfValues;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block associated with the LOV. |
|  field | string | The field associated with the LOV. |

**Returns:**

[ListOfValues](./forms42core.listofvalues.md)

The List of Values (LOV) for the given block and field.
